duties_responsibilities.duty: Accelerate the penetration of bank mortgage services in the designated territory to grow the business.
Source and build relationships with new referral partners within the local community for Home Lending business.
Support clients' home lending and other financial needs through a customer-centric approach and strong business development.
Provide high-level customer service and keep all stakeholders informed throughout the process to drive customer satisfaction and advocacy.
Foster a coaching culture to support referral partners and a branch network.
Engage with prospects and customers, establish trust, and develop long-term relationships to support an exceptional customer journey.
Work with all internal functions to build the business partnership required to support an exceptional customer journey.
Create growth, lead progressively and empathetically, and drive positive change with a high level of integrity in a high-performing team.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Banking, Finance, or a related field (Master's preferred)
